channel.title: Base of the Skull on seven obelisks
channel.description: Recent content in Base of the Skull on seven obelisks

item.title: A Fresh Start, Online
item.description: There’s a bittersweet joy about launching a project site. On the one hand, I get to see the fruit of my labor and enjoy the process of learning something new. On the other, it’s an entirely new committment. Like much of life and the endeavours we take on, it’ll be an opportunity to navigate the waters of both pride and dissapointment. I’m not going to hold myself to any posting cadence.
